transArray.content: It's very good. I booked it for my colleagues on a business trip. The location is good and the service is good. Ms. Wang at the front desk is very nice. She gave me free late check-out. I like it.
The hotelâ€™s reply: The words are silent but sweet, the greetings are ordinary but warm, your trust is the most real, the friendship is elegant but the most precious, I wish you happiness and joy!
